update mag_order

USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MERCHANT_ID = #{merchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

provinces = #{provinces,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
distric = #{distric,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_type = #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_type_name = #{productTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

product_detail_name = #{productDetailName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

merchandise_type_id = #{merchandiseTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

predict_price = #{predictPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_id = #{receiveId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
score_card = #{scoreCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update mag_order set order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERIODS = #{periods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANT_ID = #{merchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANT_NAME = mapper.select:
select
from mag_order
and state !='1'
and CUSTOMER_NAME like '%${param.customerName}%'
and CARD like '%${param.card}%'
and TEL like '%${param.tel}%'
and order_no like '%${param.orderNo}%'
and CREAT_TIME >= #{param.beginTime}
and CREAT_TIME <= #{param.endTime}
and CUSTOMER_ID = #{param.customerId}
order by CREAT_TIME desc
mapper.update:
update mag_order
state = #{state},
receive_id = '',
receive_id = '',
where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select
from mag_order where id = #{id}
select id from process_task_node where rel_id = #{orderId} and node_state = 0

SELECT magcuWhite.contractorName as contractorName, magorder.PERIODS as periods FROM mag_order magorder LEFT JOIN ( SELECT magcu.ID AS customerId, whiteCon.contractorName AS contractorName FROM mag_customer magcu INNER JOIN ( SELECT bycon.contractor_name AS contractorName, bywhli.card AS card FROM byx_white_list bywhli LEFT JOIN byx_contractor bycon ON bycon.id = bywhli.contractor_id ) whiteCon ON magcu.CARD = whiteCon.card ) magcuWhite ON magorder.CUSTOMER_ID = magcuWhite.customerId
magorder.ID = #{orderId}

SELECT productFee.id AS id, productFee.zbs_jujian_fee AS serviceFee, productFee.li_xi dateRate FROM mag_product_fee productFee LEFT JOIN ( SELECT productDetail.id AS id, magorder.ID AS orderId FROM pro_working_product_detail productDetail LEFT JOIN mag_order magorder ON magorder.product_detail = productDetail.id ) proDetailOrder ON proDetailOrder.id = productFee.product_id
proDetailOrder.orderId = #{orderId}
mapper.update:
update mag_order
state = #{state},
fee_state = #{feeState},
requestno = #{requestno},
rebates_state = #{rebatesState},
loan_state = #{loanState},
alter_time = #{alterTime},
1=1
AND id = #{id}
AND requestno = #{valRequestno}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(au.registration_id,'') AS registrationId, au.id, au.tel FROM mag_order mo LEFT JOIN app_user au ON au.id = mo.user_id WHERE mo.id = #{orderId}

SELECT mo.ID,mo.order_no,mo.USER_ID,mo.PERIODS,mo.MERCHANT_ID,mo.MERCHANT_NAME,mo.merchandise_id,mo.merchandise_type,mo.MERCHANT_NAME as merchantName, mo.merchandise_name,mo.CUSTOMER_ID,mo.CUSTOMER_NAME,mo.sex_name,mo.TEL,mo.CARD_TYPE, mo.CARD,mo.CREDIT,mo.PRECREDIT,mo.AMOUNT,mo.COMPANY,mo.BRANCH,mo.emp_id,mo.MANAGER,mo.CREAT_TIME, mo.ALTER_TIME, (case when mo.state='5' and mo.commodity_state > '15' and mo.commodity_state < '16.7' then '-1' when mo.state='5' and mo.commodity_state = '16.7' then '-2' when mo.state='5' and mo.commodity_state > '16.7' and mo.commodity_state < '18' then '-3' when mo.state='5' and mo.commodity_state = '18' then '-4' when mo.state='5' and mo.commodity_state >= '19' and mo.commodity_state < '21' and (mr.repayCount = 0 or mr.repayCount is null) then '-5' when mo.state='5' and mo.commodity_state >= '19' and mo.commodity_state < '21' and mr.repayCount > 0 then '-6' when mo.state='0' and mo.commodity_state = '21' then '-7' else mo.state end) as state, mo.APEX3,mo.BAK,mo.repay_type,mo.rate, mo.merchandise_brand,mo.merchandise_model,mo.merchandise_code, mo.provinces_id,mo.city_id,mo.distric_id,mo.distric, mo.product_type,mo.product_type_name,mo.product_name, mo.product_name_name,mo.product_detail,mo.product_detail_name,mo.product_detail_code, mo.contract_amount,mo.loan_amount,mo.sex,mo.merchandise_brand_id,mo.merchandise_type_id,mo.emp_number, mo.repay_money,mo.order_type, mo.applay_money,mo.predict_price,mo.receive_id,mo.score_card,mo.order_submission_time,mcl.provinces AS provinces,mcl.city AS city,mo.weight,mo.price,mo.delivery_state FROM mag_order mo LEFT JOIN mag_customer_live mcl ON mo.CUSTOMER_ID = mcl.customer_id LEFT JOIN mag_salesman ms on mo.emp_id=ms.id left join (select count(1) as repayCount, order_id from mag_repayment where state=2 or state=3 or state=4 group by order_id) mr on mo.id=mr.order_id
1=1
AND (mo.state!='0' or mo.commodity_state='21')
and ms.branch in (SELECT id FROM zw_sys_department where FIND_IN_SET(id, getChildDepartment(${headquarters})))
and ms.branch =#{branch}
and mo.CUSTOMER_NAME like '%${customerName}%'
and mo.CARD like '%${card}%'
and mo.TEL like '%${tel}%'
and mo.order_no like '%${orderNo}%'
and mo.state='5' and mo.commodity_state > '15' and mo.commodity_state < '16.7'
and mo.state='5' and mo.commodity_state = '16.7'
and mo.state='5' and mo.commodity_state > '16.7' and mo.commodity_state < '18'
and mo.state='5' and mo.commodity_state = '18'
and mo.state='5' and mo.commodity_state >= '19' and mo.commodity_state < '21' and (mr.repayCount = 0 or mr.repayCount is null)
and mo.state='5' and mo.commodity_state >= '19' and mo.commodity_state < '21' and mr.repayCount > 0
and mo.state='0' and mo.commodity_state = '21'
and mo.state='0' and mo.commodity_state != '21'
and mo.state='5' and mo.commodity_state <= '15'
and mo.state=#{condition}
and mo.CREAT_TIME >= #{beginTime}
and mo.CREAT_TIME <= #{endTime}
and mo.CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId}
and mo.order_type = #{orderType}
order by mo.CREAT_TIME desc

SELECT mo.ID,mo.order_no,mo.USER_ID,mo.PERIODS,mo.MERCHANT_ID,mo.MERCHANT_NAME,mo.merchandise_id,mo.merchandise_type, mo.merchandise_name,mo.CUSTOMER_ID,mo.CUSTOMER_NAME,mo.sex_name,mo.TEL,mo.CARD_TYPE, mo.CARD,mo.CREDIT,mo.PRECREDIT,mo.AMOUNT,mo.COMPANY,mo.BRANCH,mo.emp_id,mo.MANAGER,mo.CREAT_TIME, mo.ALTER_TIME,mo.state,mo.APEX3,mo.BAK,mo.repay_type,mo.rate, mo.merchandise_brand,mo.merchandise_model,mo.merchandise_code, mo.provinces_id,mo.city_id,mo.distric_id,mo.distric, mo.product_type,mo.product_type_name,mo.product_name, mo.product_name_name,mo.product_detail,mo.product_detail_name,mo.product_detail_code, mo.contract_amount,mo.loan_amount,mo.sex,mo.merchandise_brand_id,mo.merchandise_type_id,mo.emp_number, mo.repay_money,mo.order_type, mo.applay_money,mo.predict_price,mo.receive_id,mo.score_card FROM mag_order mo LEFT JOIN mag_customer cus ON cus.id = mo.CUSTOMER_ID
mo.state = #{param.state} and mo.CUSTOMER_ID =#{param.customerId}

SELECT mo.ID,mo.order_no,mo.USER_ID,mo.PERIODS,mo.MERCHANT_ID,mo.MERCHANT_NAME,mo.merchandise_id,mo.merchandise_type, mo.merchandise_name,mo.CUSTOMER_ID,mo.CUSTOMER_NAME,mo.sex_name,mo.TEL,mo.CARD_TYPE, mo.CARD,mo.CREDIT,mo.PRECREDIT,mo.AMOUNT,mo.COMPANY,mo.BRANCH,mo.emp_id,mo.MANAGER,mo.CREAT_TIME, mo.ALTER_TIME,mo.state,mo.APEX3,mo.BAK,mo.repay_type,mo.rate, mo.merchandise_brand,mo.merchandise_model,mo.merchandise_code, mo.provinces_id,mo.city_id,mo.distric_id,mo.distric, mo.product_type,mo.product_type_name,mo.product_name, mo.product_name_name,mo.product_detail,mo.product_detail_name,mo.product_detail_code, mo.contract_amount,mo.loan_amount,mo.sex,mo.merchandise_brand_id,mo.merchandise_type_id,mo.emp_number, mo.repay_money,mo.order_type, mo.applay_money,mo.predict_price,mo.receive_id,mo.score_card FROM mag_order mo LEFT JOIN mag_customer cus ON cus.id = mo.CUSTOMER_ID
mo.CUSTOMER_ID =#{param.customerId} AND mo.state=#{param.state}
mapper.update:
UPDATE mag_order
AMOUNT = #{amount},
CREDIT = #{credit},
PRECREDIT = #{precredit},
predict_price=#{predictPrice},
applay_money=#{applayMoney},
Order_state=#{orderState},
answer_state=#{answerState},
answer_score=#{answerScore},
commodity_state=#{commodityState},
alter_time=#{alterTime},
loan_amount=#{loanAmount},
Examine_time=#{examineTime},
contract_amount=#{contractAmount},
repay_money=#{repayMoney},
repay_date=#{repayDate},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select user_id,count_name,card_num,bank_card,account_bank,account_branch_bank,account_bank_id,tel,account_province,account_city from mag_customer_account where USER_ID in (SELECT USER_ID FROM mag_order where id=#{orderId} )

SELECT id, create_time as createTime, commit_time as commitTime, result, approve_suggestion as approveSuggestion, handler_id as handlerId, handler_name as handlerName FROM process_approve_record WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND node_id = #{nodeId}

SELECT o.ID AS orderId , o.CUSTOMER_ID as customerId, o.order_no AS orderNo , o.product_name_name AS productName , o.applay_money AS applayMoney , o.PERIODS AS periods , o.applay_time AS applayTime , o.rate AS rate , o.Order_state as orderState, bc.bank_name AS bankName , bc.bank_subbranch AS bankSubbranch , bc.card_number AS cardNumber FROM mag_order o LEFT JOIN sys_bank_card bc ON o.CUSTOMER_ID=bc.cust_id WHERE o.ID=#{orderId}
select order_no from mag_order where id = #{id}
